description: Integers which when multiplied by 3 have an odd number of 1's in their binary expansion (cf. A000069).
comments: In other words, numbers n such that 3n is odious.Numbers n such that valuation(binomial(3n,n),2) is odd. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jun 06 2004Intersection of A000069 and A008585 (multiples of 3), divided by 3.
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,214,if(valuation(binomial(3*n,n),2)%2==1,print1(n,",")))(MAGMA) [ n : n in [0..150] | IsOdd(&+Intseq(3*n, 2))]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Apr 13 2011
author: _Dan Hoey_
